faqs.question: What is an aptitude test?
faqs.answer: An aptitude test is an assessment used to determine a person's skill or ability in a particular area.

faqs.question: How many questions are in the Quantitative Aptitude section?
faqs.answer: There are 10 questions in the Quantitative Aptitude section.

faqs.question: Can I go back to a previous question?
faqs.answer: No, once you move to the next question, you cannot return to the previous one.

faqs.question: Is there any negative marking?
faqs.answer: No, there is no negative marking unless specifically mentioned.

faqs.question: How will I see my score?
faqs.answer: Your score and results will be displayed after you complete the test.
